name: Iron Ladies 2048
description:
By the year 2048, humanity has made an incredible leap in the quantum technologies. And the culmination of it was a new type of androids, crypto-androids. What's so special about them? They need only crypto currency to work, they can replace any job in the world... But most importantly, there are very cute android girls! You'll get to know them closer. How close? It's up to you!

Iron Ladies 2048 merges classic gameplay pattern of 2048 and the cyberpunk setting. Collect points and complete tasks to make cyber-ladies strip down.Features:
  • Simple and familiar gameplay in a new setting;
  • Various tasks that will allow you to see the girls in all their beauty;
  • Rush mode: collect as many points as possible within limited time!
  • More achievements for your collection.
